content: We have a requirement to bring back the most recent 100 (configurable) MedicationOrders and MedicationDispense in a single query i.e. we cant call 2 endpoints. So the resultset should contain both MedicationOrders and MedicationDispenses based on date created (prescribe and dispense date) and only 100 entries returned. What type of FHIR search method/endpoint should be used for this type of search.
right now your only option is a batch, but see task GF#12148
@Yunwei Wang that wont work as it will omit MedicationOrders that do not have an associated MedicationDispense which is not what we're after. Cheers
Yes. the batch of searches is what I would do.
